full_description:
Forward Slope currently has one (1) full-time position for a Jr. Software Engineer to join our team. The position is located in San Diego, California.

Forward Slope, Inc. is seeking a fast-learning full-stack software developer to provide software development and sustainment services for the Department of Defense (DoD) and the Naval Information Warfare Center (NIWC). This effort includes systems engineering, software development, and sustainment of command and control (C2) systems that allow users to access, manipulate, and display relevant mission data.

Required Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, mathematics, or physics
Demonstrated software engineering experience with:
Object-oriented programming (i.e. Java, C++)
Currently hold an active SECRET clearance or be able to obtain one

Desired Qualifications:

Demonstrated software engineering experience with:
UI development with modern web technologies (i.e. Node.js, Angular, React)
RDBMS database design (i.e. SQL and JPA for PostgreSQL)
Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) and web services (i.e. REST, AJAX, JSON, XML)
Linux and Windows administration
DevOps engineering (i.e. Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Vagrant)
Containerization (i.e. Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift)
Cloud computing infrastructure (i.e. AWS, Microsoft Azure)
Atlassian Suite (i.e. JIRA, Confluence, Bitbucket)

Forward Slope Inc., is an Equal Opportunity Employer: Minorities/Women/Veterans/Disable
